MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD6 postcode area of Melrose. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.44am. Repairs will take longer than expected due to the road conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.04am on Thursday 14th January 2021.
